pull.title: Create MiningRequiresPeers chain param
pull.body: This removes two direct references to CChainParams::REGTEST and helps move towards the goal of chainparams working with the "quacks like a duck" philosophy.

events.body:
Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/1dfd2895e8650418dc7aa27dd5b3ff5219066a84 for binaries and test log.
This test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/current/
Contact BlueMatt on freenode if something looks broken.

issue.title: MainNet is the special case for the GUI
Improvements in CChainParams
issue.body:
Replace direct references to RegTest() with constant parameters on CChainParams interface.
EDIT: dependency merged
